item.title: An unordered list of hidden gems inside NixOS — kokada
item.description: After using NixOS for the last 5+ years as my main OS, I end up with a configuration with many things that are interesting for one reason or another, but it is not listed anywhere (well, except if you are the kind of person that reads man 5 configuration.nix or the release notes in every release).

item.title: Celebrating 6 years since Valve announced Steam Play Proton for Linux
item.description: Today marks 6 years since Valve decided to change everything, especially for Linux fans, with the announcement of Steam Play Proton. Thanks to it, the Steam Deck and Desktop Linux gaming have continued to thrive.

item.title: Async hazard: mmap is secretly blocking IO
item.description: Memory-mapping a file is convenient, but it's a hazard when used with async/await concurrent code: it means a "simple" memory index does blocking IO.

item.title: OpenAI Forks GPT-4 into Separate ChatGPT and API Models
item.description: OpenAI has split their GPT-4 model into two distinct versions: one optimized for ChatGPT and another for API use. This change was announced on Twitter, where OpenAI stated they now offer in the API…
